org.testsuite.core

Class TestRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testsuite.core.TestRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FitTestRunner, JemmyTestRunner, JunitTestRunner, TestRunnerImplementation

    public abstract class TestRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    From this class all TestRunner be derived. In version 0.2, a separate JVM is created by exec that method is overridden in child classes in which the test is executed. In version 0.3 an additional method is generated, which must be overridden in child classes. This method is passed and executed the test.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Ren√© Majewski

      • fireTestExecutedCompleted

        public void fireTestExecutedCompleted(java.lang.Object source,
                             java.lang.String pName,
                             java.lang.String tName,
                             int suiteId,
                             int testId,
                             java.lang.String result)
        Creates the event data with the given values and sends it to all listed TestEventListeners.

        source - Object that the event triggered.
        pName - The name of test suite package.
        tName - The name of the test.
        suiteId - The test suite id.
        testId - The test id.
        result - The result string.

      • runWithoutJvm

        protected abstract boolean runWithoutJvm(java.lang.String name,
                    Test test,
                    int exit)
        Is called to executed the test without a separate JVM.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the test file
        test - The object of Test.
        exit - The exit status.
        Returns:
        True if the test has been executed. False if the test was not executed.
